items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 11 years on Untappd!

Whether you’re feeling extra special or extra strong, stopping by the local pub for a delicious Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter is always a good decision! That's 75 different beers with the style of Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter. Try 5 more for Level 16!

beer.beer_description: Our top selling, award winning, best bitter. A light amber colour, TEA is refreshing, hoppy and well balanced. Surely the best drink of the day!

items.badge_description: Dispensed traditionally by hand pump, cask beers are best served at 55°F. This temperature allows all of the flavor nuances to emerge and permits appreciation of the often unfiltered texture. That's 55 checkins with the serving style of Cask! Try 5 more for Level 12!

items.checkin_comment: One that I keep going back to.

Our top selling, award winning, best bitter. A light amber colour, TEA is refreshing, hoppy and well balanced. Surely the best drink of the day!

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 55 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 12!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 80 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 17!

beer.beer_description: Our top selling, award winning, best bitter. A light amber colour, TEA is refreshing, hoppy and well balanced. Surely the best drink of the day!

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 200 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 41!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 50 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 11!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 25 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 6.

beer.beer_description: Our top selling, award winning, best bitter. A light amber colour, TEA is refreshing, hoppy and well balanced. Surely the best drink of the day!

user.bio: All I really want these days is a balanced, well kept and tasty session bitter - simples!

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 235 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 48!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 325 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 66!

beer.beer_description: Our top selling, award winning, best bitter. A light amber colour, TEA is refreshing, hoppy and well balanced. Surely the best drink of the day!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 140 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 29. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
